about.title: About Nini
about.bio:
I'm Nini Chaladze, a Georgian entrepreneur passionate about celebrating authentic craftsmanship and building meaningful communities. Through Kosi.gifts and Metviton, I create spaces where tradition meets contemporary vision.

My work is rooted in the belief that every piece should tell a story, every connection should be intentional, and every experience should inspire growth.
about.mission: Handcrafted moments. Connected communities. Authentic stories from Georgia to the world.
